thread.title: Ronnie morgan
thread.title_full: R&G Brenner Income Tax reviewed by Ronnie morgan

author: Ronnie morgan
title: Ronnie morgan
text: I feel that 556 dollars is too much money to file for my income tax since I got a rapid refund, on top of that I have to give back 100 dollars. I have wanted a month and 2 weeks. I feel that the balance due should be reduced to more of a reasonable amount
